Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.name: resourceManager
Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.abstract: Builds the resource manager which recovers the latest state of Bubo

Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.name: deregisterProject(pName:)
Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.abstract: Derehisters a project from the root configuration

Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.name: newProject(pName:)
Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.abstract: Initialises a new project and registeres it in the root configuration.

Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.name: removeProject(pName:)
Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.abstract: Removes a project and all its subdirectories permanently from disk. Use with special care!

Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.name: addService(projectName:serviceName:gitRepoURL:)
Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.abstract: Adds a new service to a project. The service is cloned from a valid git URL.

Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.name: buildGraph(projectName:serviceName:)
Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.abstract: Build the dependency graph for a given project and service

Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.name: writeToDot(projectName:serviceName:)
Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.abstract: Write the latest dependency graph for a service to .dot file

Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.name: printServices(projectName:)
Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.abstract: Prints all services of a project to stdout

Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.name: refreshServices(projectName:)
Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.abstract: Checks a projects service directory for new, deleted or changed services and refreshes the project configuration

Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.name: removeService(projectName:serviceName:)
Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.abstract: Removes service from project configuration and deletes it permanently from disk. Use with caution!

Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.name: pullService(projectName:serviceName:)
Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.abstract: Pull latest changes on a services git repository

Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.name: pullAllServices(projectName:)
Classes/OperationsManager.html#/s:23Oper.abstract: Pull latest changes for all services of a specifc project
